name: Quick QR Code Scanner
description: Very fast QR code reader and bar code scanner.  Features :  * QR Codes and supports most Barcode * Support flashlight in the dark  Use easy How to:  If the location you want to scan a QR code or barcode on the screen, in square Quick QR Scanner automatically detects.  If you include a URL when you scan the QR code can be open when you click a link to open the linked site. And if that includes text can be immediately confirmed.  Text, URL, ISBN, products, contacts, calendars, email, location, Wi-Fi Automatically recognize the format.  Support Code: QR Code, Data Matrix, Quick Code, EQS, EAN8 / 13, Code39, Code128, Barcode, QRCode  This app has been developed based on ZXing library, Apache License 2.0.
